=== About ===

Docky is an application that allows for a "dock" menu at the bottom of the screen.  To install Docky, just type sudo apt-get install docky in a terminal.  

=== Tips ===

To remove a docklet, just click and drag the docklet off the dock, and it should "poof" and be deleted.

To add a docklet, you can click and drag an icon to the dock.

=== Development ===

to get the source code you can type sudo apt-get source docky.
